product_name: REI  Midweight Polartec Power Dry Half Zip Top - Men's Tall
long_description: A warm, wicking base layer like the REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Half Zip top in men's tall sizes can make the difference between cold-weather trips to remember and those to forget.
